commit.message: Auto merge of #28723 - carols10cents:0-or-O-or-o, r=steveklabnik Especially when documenting the use of `0`, since zero looks very similar to `O` in fonts not meant for displaying code. Other literal characters, traits, etc should also use code formatting. This change makes this documentation more internally consistent. Before this change, circled is the character I was using this documentation to find out about and that confused me when it wasn't immediately clear what character it was: After this change: I ran `make check-docs` and didn't break anything :star:
